numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph name is "The generational views on the future of our planet".
2. People who are 15 years old and people who are 24 years old are in the 15-to-24 age range.
3. People in the 15-to-24 age range are more optimistic than other age groups.
4. People in the 15-to-24 age range view progress in the world in a positive way.
5. Only a small percentage of people who are 40 years old or older view the world in an optimistic way.
6. Most of these optimistic people who are 40 years old or older are from African countries.
7. A small percentage of these optimistic people who are 40 years old or older are from India.
8. We wonder why the younger age group is more optimistic than the older age group.
9. We wonder whether the development of each country affects how people view the world.
11. All of us are in the 15-to-24 age range.
12. It is interesting to us to see how people in our age range view the world.
13. There is hope in our generation.
14. There is optimism in our generation.
16. There will be hope in future generations.
17. There will be optimism in future generations.
